message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this fantastic product. I think you'll love it!
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $110?
I understand you're looking to save some money, but I still need to make a profit. I can meet you in the middle at $130. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $125?
I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal. I can offer you a slight discount to $135, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $135 is still a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $128?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $140, but I'm willing to meet you at $129. That's as close as I can get to your last offer. What do you think?
I'm getting close to accepting, but I still think I can get a better deal. Would you be willing to consider a price of $126?
I've been flexible, but I think we're getting too close to my minimum price. I'm willing to meet you at $127, but that's as low as I can go. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your final offer, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $127 and my original offer of $110. Would you consider a price of $118.50?
